title: How can Drake Maye beat Texans defense? ‘Turn into Michael Vick’, says one Patriots player
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "I feel like he makes plays with his legs.
I feel like he’s comfortable using his legs.
" Drake Maye can torch opposing defenses with his scrambling ability.

title: A Boston man is charged with the nearly 30-year-old murder of a Dorchester woman
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Local News Cornell Bell, 54, is charged with the 1999 murder of a Dorchester woman, after the case was unsolved for nearly 25 years.
uffolk County Courthouse, which houses Suffolk Superior Court.
Lane Turner/The Boston Globe A Boston man is now charged with the nearly 30-year-old murder of a Dorchester woman, prosecutors announced Wednesday.

title: Bus driver for Grafton schools arrested for alleged kidnapping, endangerment
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The driver allegedly disconnected and obscured devices that recorded video, audio, and GPS information of his routes.
A bus driver was arrested for allegedly kidnapping and endangering two students in the Grafton school district.
Craig F.

title: Barnstable educator allegedly fired over Facebook posts sues district
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News “Public schools do not get to silence employees simply because they express opinions that administrators dislike,” said the president of Judicial Watch, a conservative group that filed the lawsuit.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A former Barnstable associate principal is suing the school district after, he says, he was fired over multiple Facebook posts, alleging that his right to free speech was violated.

title: Willson Contreras lands a dig at the Yankees ahead of his first season with the Red Sox
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "I’m not coming to Boston just to like the Yankees, because that’s not going to happen.
" Contreras should provide some pop in Boston's lineup.

AP Photo/John Bazemore, File The Red Sox traded for Cardinals first baseman Willson Contreras earlier this offseason to add some right-handed pop to the lineup and a veteran presence in the clubhouse.

title: Mass. resident targeted in crypto scheme on Tinder, lost over $500K, feds say
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime Federal prosecutors are seeking to recover a high sum of cryptocurrency proceeds which are valued at an estimated $200,000.
A Massachusetts resident fell for a scheme that allegedly yielded 200,000.
039646 of Tether cryptocurrency in proceeds, federal prosecutors said.

title: Will Campbell has a candid response to critics after playoff debut with Patriots
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “I don't give a [expletive] what anyone says, to be honest with you.
" Will Campbell will have a tough test against Will Anderson on Sunday.

title: Ahead of Patriots playoff game, Texans’ top receiver missing from practice
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots Nico Collins did not practice on Wednesday in Texas after suffering a concussion on Monday.
Nico Collins has been one of the top wideouts in the NFL over the last few years.

(Photo by Dylan Buell/Getty Images FOXBOROUGH — While Christian Gonzalez continues to make strides in his return from a concussion, the Houston Texans could be entering Sunday’s divisional-round playoff game at Gillette Stadium without their top receiver.

title: Drake Maye faces his toughest test yet against ‘relentless’ Texans defense
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "They're great up front, they're great in the back end, they’ve got great linebackers.
They're great all around.
They have great coaching.

title: 5 things to know about new Red Sox pitcher Ranger Suarez
author: Conor Ryan

Ranger Suarez doesn't rely on a blistering fastball to get outs.
